name: Logan Goes Back To The Future
name_original: Logan Goes Back To The Future
description:
A BTTF Fan Game Where I Steal The DeLorean And Travel In Time. BTTF Belongs To Whoever Made It. Made In Clickteam Fuison 2.5 (Info:Its Kinda Broken) Shortcuts:

Numpad+-Time Travel

ctrl+y-Control Config

ctrl+p-Pause Game

Time Travel Dates:1933,1985,1955

1933:Logan Has Crashed The DeLorean And Has To Find Plutonium!!!

1985:It Has Plutonium.

1955:Get Back To 2020!!!!

Hint:After The Cutscene,Press Numpad+.
